pre-bash.name: prevent-push-to-main
pre-bash.description: Prevents pushing directly to main or master branches
pre-bash.message:
‚ùå BLOCKED: Never push directly to main/master branch!

Please:
1. Create a feature branch: git checkout -b <branch-name>
2. Make your changes and commit
3. Push to the feature branch: git push origin <branch-name>
4. Create a Pull Request

If you need to update main, ask the user first.
